Articles.Content: What about a Game Launcher? Like Minecraft Launcher! We can choose the versions what we want to play. I think, It will be excellent. Think, you are playing 0.1 version I hope devs read this thread.

There already is a game launcher, since 0.22. Check your game folder (".../ksp_win/" when using windows), there you will find several folders, ksp.exe and launcher.exe. Open "launcher.exe", et voilÃƒÂ , enjoy that pretty launcher.

Can we choose versions?

Thanks a lot. I will look at mac when I arrived home.
No, your title is miss leading I would suggest changing it.
For now, while there is no in game way, almost all the free versions of the game up to 0.13.3 are available in the thread here.
Thread locked, this is a feature we already have
